channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report X-2024030703
item.description:
Report X-2024030703

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-22T18:13:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-05
  • City: ROGERS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2024030703 SequenceEvent: Package was called out as requiring additional processing, package was discovered to have been repackaged at another station. upon inspection, package handler stated it was overturned, causing the vented cap to release contents DescribePack: Vented cap released due to overturned package DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined hazmat tote and brought to the QA Damaged Hazmat area X-2024030704 SequenceEvent: Package was called out as requiring additional processing, package was discovered to have been repackaged at another station. upon inspection, package handler stated it was overturned, causing the vented cap to release contents DescribePack: Vented cap released due to overturned package DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined hazmat tote and brought to the QA Damaged Hazmat area
